name: luvU2thee.o.t.w.
description: video loop with sound. footage found on used VHS purchased on eBay and processed with an LZX Industries video synthesizer system. recorded with Elgato Game Capture HD60 S into OBS studio. audio created with Teenage Engineering OP-1, Modor NT-1F and OTO Machines BAM and edited and produced in Ableton. file repairs, trimming and A/V stream merging completed with ffmpeg.
